name: Runtime Destination
description: Game For Mind Storm Winter Game Jam 2023 | A puzzle game that involves manipulating the timeline of events in order to solve puzzles and progress through the game.  In this game, the player would be presented with a series of puzzles that require them to adjust the timing of events in order to achieve a specific outcome. They would have the ability to pause and rewind time in order to experiment with different strategies and optimize their approach to each puzzle.
